summary: Completed testing of P1 and P2 features for Arbeit Talent Portal. All 10 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend testing verified all features working correctly: Admin Dashboard Interview Pipeline Stats, Client Dashboard Interview Pipeline Stats, Candidate Detail CV Viewer with Open/Download buttons, Public Candidate Booking Page, and Governance Console (Roles & Permissions, Assign Roles to Users, Access Matrix, Audit Logs).

issues: When selecting a client, no roles are displayed in the list (may need to scroll or roles may not be created for all clients)

critical_code_review_comments: Interview Pipeline Stats widget displays correctly on both Admin and Client dashboards
CV Viewer shows Open and Download buttons, resume versioning section removed as expected
Public Booking Page displays interview details and available time slots correctly
Governance Console has all 4 tabs functional: Roles & Permissions, Assign Roles to Users, Access Matrix, Audit Logs
seed_data_creation: Used existing test data from iteration 1
context_for_next_testing_agent: P1/P2 features fully tested. Interview Pipeline Stats API returns correct counts. Public booking endpoints work with token authentication. Governance Console pages all functional with data. CV Viewer shows PDF in iframe with Open/Download buttons.

backend_api_tests.GET /api/interviews/stats/pipeline: PASS - Returns pipeline statistics with all status counts
backend_api_tests.GET /api/public/interviews/{id}?token=xx: PASS - Returns interview details for valid token
backend_api_tests.GET /api/interviews/{id}/booking-link: PASS - Returns booking link and token
backend_api_tests.GET /api/governance/roles: PASS - Returns list of client roles

frontend_tests.Admin Dashboard - Interview Pipeline Sta: PASS - Widget displays with all status counts (Awaiting: 3, Confirmed: 1, Scheduled: 2, Completed: 1, No Shows: 1, Cancelled: 1)
frontend_tests.Client Dashboard - Interview Pipeline St: PASS - Widget displays with same counts
frontend_tests.Candidate Detail - CV Viewer: PASS - Shows Original Resume section with Open and Download buttons, PDF iframe present
frontend_tests.Candidate Detail - Resume Versioning Rem: PASS - Resume Versions section not present
frontend_tests.Public Booking Page: PASS - Displays interview details (Company, Position, Duration, Candidate) and 2 available time slots
frontend_tests.Governance - Roles & Permissions: PASS - Page loads with client selector and Create New Role button
frontend_tests.Governance - Assign Roles to Users: PASS - Shows users with Assign Role buttons
frontend_tests.Governance - Access Matrix: PASS - Shows permission matrix with users and permissions
frontend_tests.Governance - Audit Logs: PASS - Shows audit entries with filters and Export CSV button
